title: UAE launches Dubai+: New free streaming platform with 30,000 hours of content
summary_full: Dubai Plus, a new streaming platform, has launched in the UAE. It offers free access to Emirati and Arab content for all ages. The platform aims to showcase local culture and talent. It features TV shows, films, and live sports. Dubai Plus complements global services by focusing on regional storytelling. This initiative strengthens Dubai's position as a content hub.
